utils.notFound: Enweghị nkuzi achọtara na ụdị a.

content.title: Vievlog - Mụta ya Online maka Free | Ọ na-amụ na ule
content.signUp: Debanye aha ya na ọmụmụ ya
content.oneStopPlatform: Vievlog - Gị kacha mma ọ na-akwụghị ụgwọ
content.startLearningNow: Bido na-amụta & kwadebe maka ule Topik
content.whyChooseVieVlog: Kedu ihe kpatara ịhọrọ Vievlogy N'ihi na ọ na-amụ?
content.learnIT: Nweta ihe mmụta dị elu, nkuzi, na akụrụngwa site na ndị nkuzi na-enweghị ụgwọ.
content.learnFromExperts: Mụta ya n'aka ndị ọkà mmụta obodo na ndị ọkachamara nwere ahụmahụ.
content.anytimeAnywhere: Mụta ya n'oge ọ bụla, ebe ọ bụla
content.learnAtYourOwnPace: Mụọ ya na aka gị na nsị na-akparaghị ókè na nkuzi niile.
content.coverAllAspects: Agụmakwụkwọ na-ekpuchi ya isiokwu dị elu, gụnyere ụtọ asụsụ, okwu, okwu, na omume mkparịta ụka.
content.viewAllIT: Lelee Vievag ọ bụla na usoro ọmụmụ
content.whatOurLearnersSay: Ihe ndị na-amụ banyere anyị na-ekwu banyere Vevlogy

testimonial1.quote: Vievlog nyeere m aka nke ọma maka nyocha m.
testimonial1.name: Nguyen Minh Ah

testimonial2.quote: Mụta ya na vievlog adịla mfe ma nwekwuo ọ funụ!
testimonial2.name: Tran Haa Nam

testimonial3.quote: Ekelere m Velavog, m mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe m na-eme.
testimonial3.name: Le thy huoon

content.yourOneStopShop: Igwe okwu gị na-akwụsị maka ya manyere ya nkà na ule Topik. Nweta ihe omumu ihe omumu di iche iche n'efu ma rute asusu gi na ebumnuche taa!
content.connectWithUs: Jikọọ na Vievlog na Social Media

metadata.lesson: Chọgharịa na nkuzi kachasị ọhụrụ ma chọta usoro zuru oke maka ọkwa nka gị.
